=jsf-archetype=

This project defines a Web project archetype that relies on Spring, Hibernate, Maven, JSF2 and PrimeFaces. It creates a main project splitted into two modules :
<ul>
	<li>A business module : contains all the classes and interfaces representing the business aspect of the application;</li>
	<li>A web ùodule : contains all the components that are used in the Web GUI.</li>
</ul>

{{{
mvn archetype:generate -DgroupId=com.google
	-DartifactId=test 
	-DarchetypeGroupId=jee-utils 
	-DarchetypeArtifactId=jsf-archetype 
	-DarchetypeVersion=1.0.0
}}}
